Hello! May I ask for OCBC365 card  do we need to spend min.$800 to clock the cashback or any amount will do?
To enjoy the above cashback  you need to spend a minimum of S$800 based on posted transactions in a calendar month. If you spend less than S$800  a flat 0.25% cashback is awarded.
no 1% fee if clock below 1k in calendar month
Yes need spend 800$ eligible spend to get the cashback
